term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - deodorizer in atmospheric chemistry
term.title: deodorizer

item.text: Equipment for the removal of noxious gases and odours, which may consist of combustion, absorption, or adsorption units.

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2184 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
